title: varittan pEraruLai
sahitya:
vArittan pEraruLai vazhangiDavE tayangAda Arumukhan shIraDiyai sEra vArum sendUril


anupallavi

  vAri mOdum alai OyAdu shIrum karum kaDalinOram vITru varaum vaLLalai varam kOravE


caraNam    vandu vandu mEnmEl cintai migha nondiDavE vATTi varum innalgaLai OTTum aruL tandiDavE
sendUranadu pAdAravinda malar paNindiDuvOr santOSa sAgaramIdu midandu magizhndiDuvAr
